topic.title: Adding Libraries to the Built-in FO Processor (XML with XSLT and FO)

keywords.indexterm: Add hyphenation libraries to built-in FO processor
Add PDF image support to built-in FO processor

body.p: Starting with version 20.0, both hyphenation and PDF image support are enabled by default in the built-in Apache FO processor. For older version of , use the following procedures to enable such support.

section.title: Adding Hyphenation Support for XML with XSLT Transformation Scenarios
section.p:
If you want to add newer hyphenation libraries or you are using an older version of , follow this procedure:
Create a folder called fop in the /lib folder.
Download the compiled JAR from OFFO.
Copy the fop-hyph.jar file into the /lib/fop folder.
Restart .

section.title: Adding Support for PDF Images
section.p:
To add support for PDF images in an older version of , follow these steps:
Create a folder called fop in the /lib folder.
Download the fop-pdf-images JAR libraries.
Copy the libraries into the /lib/fop folder.
Restart .
